landing.title: Welcome to PassKey App.
landing.subtitle: PassKey is a secure application designed to manage and store passkeys securely. It features a simple login system and allows users to create, store, and access passkeys securely using a passkey-based authentication mechanism.
landing.passkey-not-supported-subtitle: It seems your device not compatible for passkey key creation.
landing.passkey-supported-subtitle: Your device is compatible for passkey key creation. Sign up to create passkey.

modal.title: Oh Snap!
modal.subtitle: It seems Passkey is not supported in your browser or machine!!üôÅ

success-message.passkey-supported-success: Your browser supports the necessary APIs for passkey authentication.
